summary: Encapsulates a single decoding hypothesis used in beam‑search for CTC/RNNT speech recognizers, storing the token IDs, overall score, optional decoded text, timestamps, alignments, per‑frame/token/word confidence values, decoder and language‑model states, and related metadata.
business_intent: Provide a unified data structure that tracks all information needed to rank, compare, and post‑process candidate sequences during speech‑recognition decoding, facilitating integration with external language models and error‑rate calculations.
